Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: College Smart Utility and Academic Management System

Features:
- Flask + Jinja2 + SQLite architecture
- Role-based access \(Student, Staff, HOD, Management\)
- Modules: Authentication, Attendance, Marks, Fees, Library,
  Complaints, Feedback, Notices, Timetable, Students, Notifications
- Auto notifications for low attendance, complaints, feedback
- Responsive UI with CSS styling

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
